nodes.documentation: Only (store) owners shall be allowed to add or update the store specific details - e.g. product.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
A function to return the state details for a given store contract
@return a list of values with the following details
  - Owner Address
  - Store name
  - Store identifier
  - Store description
nodes.name: getStoreDetails

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref
struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
A store owner will use this function to add a new product to his / her store.
     * Whenever a new product is added, the product map will be updated to hold all the product and their details
across all the store and store owners.
     * TODO: Add expiry feature and use the Auto Deprecation pattern to expire a product. Also, implement the use case
     that will prevent the shoppers from buying an expired product!
nodes.name: addProductToTheStore

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Store.Product storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
The update product function will be called to update the details of an existing function.
     * In a regular course of a business, the following amounts may get updated.
- quantity
- productName
- price
- description
     * TODO : Add an additional parameter for discountPercentage
nodes.name: updateProduct

nodes.documentation:
A store owner can withdraw fund from a given store
     * BP1: Fail early and fail loud
 - Fail early and fail loud pattern has been used to ensure that zero amount withdrwal doesn't take place.
nodes.name: withdrawFund

Also, add that address in the Admin list.

nodes.documentation:
A super administrator can create one or more administrator, who will have same access, except that
they cannot create another administrator
nodes.name: createAdminUser

nodes.documentation: This function shall return all the admin address in the market place
nodes.name: getAdminUsers

nodes.documentation:
This function verifies if an address has the following accesses or not
- Super Admin
- Admins
- Store Owner
nodes.name: checkAccess

arguments.value: The store owner with the same address already exist!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The store owner with the same address already exist!"

nodes.documentation:
Any Admin shall be able to add a store owner.
Of course, we need to make sure that a given address is added only once.
nodes.name: createStoreOwner

nodes.documentation: This function shall return all the store owners address in the market place
nodes.name: getStoreOwners

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (string memory,string memory,uint256,address,contract EIP20) returns (contract Store)

nodes.documentation:
A store owner shall be able to create one or more stores.
The created store will be associated with the store owner using storeFrontMap, where the store owner's
address is a key and the value is a map of storeId and Store.
nodes.name: createStoreFront

nodes.documentation: this function will be used for retriving all the stores of a given store owner
nodes.name: getStores

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The provided address is not a store owner!"

arguments.value: The provided address is not a store owner!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The provided address is not a store owner!"

nodes.documentation:
Any Admin shall be able to allocate certain number of new tokens to a store owner.
Of course, we need to make sure that a given address is indeed a store owner
nodes.name: allocateNewTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev This method returns the token balance of a given account.
@param accountAddress is the address whose balance is being queried
nodes.name: getTokenBalance

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You do not have the sufficient consensus to close the market place!"

arguments.value: You do not have the sufficient consensus to close the market place!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You do not have the sufficient consensus to close the market place!"

nodes.documentation:
The market place can be destructed by only the super admin, that too when we have at least 75% of the store owners
agreeing to this decision.
nodes.name: closeMarketPlace

nodes.documentation:
In case we want to allow the closure of the Market Place then implement this function
with proper logic.
nodes.name: getConsentForClosure
